name: Selma Bajrami
description: '''Selma Bajrami''' ({{IPA|bs|sělma bajrǎːmi|pron}}; born 4 July 1980) is a [[Bosnia and Herzegovina|Bosnia]]n singer. She began her professional music career with the release of her debut album ''[[Kad suza ne bude...]]'' (1998) at the age of 18. To date, Bajrami has released nine studio albums and is among the best-known popular music performers from [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]].
